column1: #Text=Zaheer says : " I met your uncle when I was a teenager , after we had both joined the Red Lotus .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " He closed the portals , severing humans from spirits .
#Text=Even you realize the error in his ways .
#Text=" Korra says : " So all along , you and my uncle planned to use me to open the portals and release Vaatu ?
#Text=That 's why you tried to take me when I was a kid ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Yes , and with members of the Red Lotus as your elemental masters , we could 've taught you so much .
#Text=" Korra says : " It sounds like you were just trying to brainwash me so I 'd do whatever you wanted .
#Text=All I wanted was to show the Avatar a better path for the world .
